title: Hydroponics Growing System, 12 Pods Hydroponics Growing System Indoor Garden with LED Grow Light, Height Adjustable Indoor Gardening System, Hydroponic Growing System Built-in Timer Function
descriptions:
Introducing the Hydroponics Growing System, a state-of-the-art indoor garden equipped with LED Grow Light. This hydroponic system provides the perfect environment for your plants to thrive and grow effortlessly. 

The LED Grow Light features SMD LED technology, delivering a powerful 25W of full-spectrum light that ensures optimal growth. With 30% more luminous flux than traditional lights, it accelerates growth by 5 times, allowing you to enjoy lush, healthy plants in no time.

The advanced Deep Flow Technique water circulation system ensures that your plants receive the perfect amount of water and nutrients. With a cycle of every 30 minutes, the system keeps the water fresh and clean, promoting the growth of strong and vibrant plants. Plus, it operates with low noise, ensuring a peaceful gardening experience.

The Hydroponics Growing System comes with a 4L water tank, providing self-sufficient growth for up to 18 days. The tank also features a convenient water level gauge, allowing you to monitor the water levels easily. The larger space for roots ensures that your plants have ample room to flourish.

With an adjustable height of up to 17.78 inches, this system accommodates various plant types and allows for easy customization. The built-in timer ensures that your plants receive the right amount of light and water at the perfect intervals, further enhancing their growth.

In the package, you will find everything you need to get started. It includes the Hydroponics System, Plant Food A and B, 12 Planting Hats, 12 Planting Baskets, 12 Biochar Mud, an Adapter, and a Manual. Rest assured, your investment is protected with a 360-day warranty period, and our after-sales service is available whenever you need assistance.

Experience the future of gardening with the Hydroponics Growing System. Order now and watch your plants thrive like never before.

Introducing the Hydroponics Growing System, a state-of-the-art indoor garden that allows you to grow plants efficiently and effortlessly. With 12 pods and an LED Grow Light, this system is perfect for any plant enthusiast.

The LED Grow Light features SMD LED technology, providing a power output of 25W. Its full-spectrum feature ensures optimal growth conditions for your plants, while its 30% more luminous flux than traditional lights accelerates growth by 5 times. Say goodbye to slow growth and hello to thriving plants!

The Water Circulation System utilizes an Advanced Deep Flow technique, circulating water every 30 minutes. Not only does it keep your plants hydrated, but it also maintains low noise levels, ensuring a peaceful environment. Fresh and clean water is guaranteed.

The Water Tank has a generous capacity of 4L, providing self-sufficiency for up to 18 days. It also includes a Water Level Gauge, allowing you to monitor the water levels easily. With a larger space for roots, your plants will have ample room to grow and thrive.

The Adjustable Height feature allows you to extend the rod up to 17.78 inches, accommodating the growth of various plant types. No need to worry about outgrowing the system!

The package includes everything you need to get started: 1 Hydroponics System, 1 Plant Food A and B, 12 Planting Hats, 12 Planting Baskets, 12 Biochar Muds, 1 Adapter, and 1 Manual. With these items, you'll have all the essentials for a successful gardening experience.

We stand behind the quality of our product, offering a warranty period of 360 days. Our after-sales service is also available to assist you with any inquiries or concerns you may have. Your satisfaction is our top priority.

Experience the future of gardening with the Hydroponics Growing System. Start growing your own plants indoors and enjoy the benefits of fresh, healthy produce all year round. Order now and transform your space into a thriving garden!
